casebody.data:
Derek HUMBLE
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 7, 2018

Peter Tsimbidaros, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Rocco A. Chiarenza, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Derek Humble's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 180 Conn. App. 697, 184 A.3d 804 (2018), is denied.
